compounddef.title: MCUMgr module for full Modem Firmware Upgrade

briefdescription.para: Setup and register the command handler for full modem update command handler group.

detaileddescription.para: The modem library must be initialized in DFU mode before calling this function - nrf_modem_lib_init(FULL_DFU_MODE).

parameterdescription.para: on success, negative integer on failure.

briefdescription.para: MCUMgr based Full Modem Firmware Update(FMFU).

detaileddescription.para: The Full Modem Firmware Upgrade (FMFU) is a module with functions that hooks into MCUMgr for doing a full modem update over a transport layer with the SMP protocol.
The command values are 0 for get_hash and 1 for firmware_upload
